content: Erlang, The Sacred Divinity is an optional secret boss you can find by entering Chapter 3's Secret Area of Mount Mei in Black Myth: Wukong. You'll need to complete all chapters' secret areas and an elusive side quest before you can find this tough boss.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Erlang,_The_Sacred_Divinity.md", under the primary heading "Erlang, The Sacred Divinity". The content is presented below:

Erlang, The Sacred Divinity is an optional secret boss you can find by entering Chapter 3's Secret Area of Mount Mei in Black Myth: Wukong. You'll need to complete all chapters' secret areas and an elusive side quest before you can find this tough boss.
